headline: Should ADP’s (ADP) Latest AI-Powered HR Features Influence Investor Sentiment Toward Its Competitive Position?
summary: At its annual Innovation Day earlier this week, ADP unveiled new AI-powered features across its Workforce Now, Global Payroll, and Lyric HCM platforms, aiming to eliminate manual HR processes and streamline payroll, analytics, compliance, and learning functions. The newly launched capabilities rely on ADP Assist, integrating real-time analytics and anomaly detection from a workforce database spanning over 1.1 million companies in more than 140 countries, offering users tailored insights and...

headline: 5 Relatively Secure And Cheap Dividend Stocks, Yields Up To 9% (Sept. 2025)
summary: We go over a filtering process to select just 5 conservative dividend-growth stocks from more than 7,500 companies. Read here for picks from our monthly series.
